テスト実行
yokoi@reiuns-MacBook-Pro next-eggrypto-debug % npx jest tests/createMonsterEvent.test.ts

サーバ起動
yokoi@reiuns-MacBook-Pro next-eggrypto-debug % yarn run dev

migration
yokoi@reiuns-MacBook-Pro next-eggrypto-debug % yokoi@reiuns-MacBook-Pro next-eggrypto-debug % npx prisma migrate dev

railway deployチェック
yokoi@reiuns-MacBook-Pro next-eggrypto-debug % npm run build
